params.newProtocolGovernance: Address of the new ProtocolGovernance that has been committed

params.start: Timestamp of the start of the new ProtocolGovernance

lockNft(uint256).details: Use this method when vault structure is set up and should become immutable. Can be called by owner.

returns.nft: Nft minted for the given Vault

TokenLocked(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when token is locked for transfers

VaultRegistered(address,address,uint256,.notice: Emitted when new Vault is registered in VaultRegistry

isLocked(uint256).notice: Checks if the nft is locked for all transfers

nftForVault(address).notice: Get NFT ID for given Vault contract address.

registerVault(address,address).notice: Register new Vault and mint NFT.

stagedProtocolGovernanceTimestamp().notice: Minimal timestamp when staged ProtocolGovernance can be applied.

vaultForNft(uint256).notice: Get Vault for the giver NFT ID.

userdoc.notice: This contract is used to manage ERC721 NFT for all Vaults.
